PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-03912016-05-20NRCAN,  NEB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectIssuance of Licences GL-313 and GL-314 - Pieridae Energy (Canada) Ltd.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE OF LICENCES (1) GL-313 to Pieridae Energy (Canada) Ltd. to export natural gas in the form of liquefied natural gas, from a point of export to be the outlet of the loading arm of the natural gas liquefaction plant to be located in the vicinity of Goldboro, Nova Scotia; and (2) GL-314 to Pieridae Energy (Canada) Ltd. to import natural gas, from the interconnect between Maritimes and Northeast Canada pipeline and the Maritimes and Northeast U.S. pipeline along the Canadian-U.S. border between the province of New Brunswick and the State of Maine, near St. Stephen, New Brunswick.
AttachmentsAttachment
